transport.access_summary: Multiple buses run from central Edinburgh. The walk begins in Holyrood Park.

ai.summary: A short but rewarding walk to the volcanic summit of Arthur’s Seat, offering sweeping views across Edinburgh and the Firth of Forth.
ai.terrain_summary: Good paths with occasional rocky steps. Short but steep ascent to the summit.
ai.safety_notes: Can be windy on top. Paths may be slippery after rain.

seo.title: Arthur’s Seat Circular Walk – Best Views in Edinburgh
seo.meta_description: A short and popular 4.8 km walk to Arthur’s Seat with stunning city views. Perfect for beginners and visitors.
